original_title: 13th: A Conversation with Oprah Winfrey & Ava DuVernay
overview: In this 30-minute interview, Oprah Winfrey sits down with director Ava DuVernay to discuss her Oscar-nominated film, historical cycles of oppression and the broken prison system.
title: 13th: A Conversation with Oprah Winfrey & Ava DuVernay
